items.summary: Add the following Google Search Console site verification meta tag to the document <head> so it is present on the home page load: <meta name="google-site-verification" content="jiX9_ApHGMseCG4mi-MUNxWqe4-XW7LiWlKq_81pkwQ" />. Implement this in the static HTML entrypoint (frontend/index.html) within the <head> section.
